title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and domain research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data ingestion, processing, optimization components, and data storage. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, and security aspects.

title: Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop components for ingesting and preprocessing real-time sensor data from oil wells.

title: AI Optimization Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for optimizing oil well production based on sensor data.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop a user interface for monitoring well performance and adjusting extraction parameters.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database for storing sensor data, well configurations, and optimization results.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure system security and compliance with industry regulations and standards.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate system components and perform comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the system to production environments and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and provide training for end-users and support personnel.
